We offer our players lot of content, bosses, PvP, mini games, and also a lot of server events that our owner loves to have. Our EXP rate is very fair and will not disappoint you, even with Lamps in our SOF you get everyday and from voting. Our community is very friendly and our economy is very stable. No matter what, you'll always find something to do while you are on Ruins718 :).
